channel.title: What type of Auxy music would be good in A Short Film?
channel.description: It's mostly in the title. I'm planning to make a short film soon and I want to make the music using Auxy. The film will be about how powerful music is which is why I want to make most of the music myself. I was wondering what music in short films have inspired you or peaked your interest. Also, I'd appreciate it if you guys could tell me what type of music would be interesting in a music-themed short film.

item.title: What type of Auxy music would be good in A Short Film?
item.dc:creator: AzureOnyx
item.description:
Multigenre immediately comes into my mind as there is no right answer on how strong music has to be to evoke strong feelings.

Read full topic
item.source: What type of Auxy music would be good in A Short Film?

item.title: What type of Auxy music would be good in A Short Film?
item.dc:creator: Tolberto
item.description:
Great use of piano and strings would be good, also use sweet saw because detuned saw waves are the best. Also try some arps with the new sound pack

Read full topic
item.source: What type of Auxy music would be good in A Short Film?
